backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing footer text update and creation of a deployment guide with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated 1–2 sentence summaries for all frontend files and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Step-by-step guide for local setup and mainnet deployment of the portfolio app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining global CSS variables and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app enabling dark mode and rendering all portfolio sections with the footer.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutS: About section displaying a personal summary inside animated card components.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Certif: Certifications list rendered as animated cards with award icons.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Contac: Contact info and mailto-based contact form with validation and animated layout.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Footer: Footer with social links, fixed © 2026 text, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/HeroSe: Hero banner with background image, name, tagline, and smooth-scrolling CTA button.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Navbar: Responsive navbar with active-section tracking, smooth scrolling, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Renders a grid of project cards using project data with reveal animations and GitHub links.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Resume: Displays a resume download card with placeholder download logic and reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Reveal: IntersectionObserver-based component that animates children into view unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Sectio: Wrapper section component adding layout padding and a subtle patterned background.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Skills: Shows categorized skills with badges and reveal animations within a styled section.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/VideoS: Placeholder video section rendering a card indicating upcoming video content.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Exports typed project list defining titles, descriptions, tech stacks, and GitHub links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting user preference for reduced motion via media query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers with CSS variables for light/dark themes and utility classes like gradient text and borders.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors bound to CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, and design requirements for a portfolio website.
